title: Game Making My Computer Crash Even Though League Is The Only Thing Open
body: League Is Crashing My Computer Even Though Its The Only Open It Gives Me A Whea Uncorrectable Error.{{champion:238}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3142}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: I'm not familiar with an Uncorrectable error notice.  Would you be able to provide a screenshot of that so I can get more insight on your issue?  When exactly is League crashing?  I'd like to help but need more info on what's actually happening.  Let me know!
Yo how do i send you a pic

I'll try to take a picture next time it happens but i keep getting 20 min ques bc they remake ive been looking for fixes but i cant find none i always try to rejoin but they remake every time and it only happens during the loading screen
